title: Bug 35861crash in gtkeditabledeleteselection on GTK 2.2.1/Redhat 7.1
description: Bug 35861crash in gtkeditabledeleteselection on GTK 2.2.1/Redhat 7.1 After compiling, running eclipse and looking around in the environment I got a crash:An unexpected exception has been detected in native code outside the VM.Unexpected Signal : 11 occurred at PC=0x4D1DD704Function=gtkeditablegetselectionbounds+0x44Library=/usr/local/lib/libgtkx112.0.so.0Current Java thread:at
